attributes.action: Let nativity Plays be about Jesus Christ even if foreigners don't like it.
attributes.additional_details: People can't do a Christmas play involving jesus christ due to foreign religious beliefs and this is wrong as Christmas means the birth of jesus.
attributes.background: Certain school's can't have nativity Plays with jesus in it due to religious reasons but this is wrong as Christmas means the birth of christ. We are a Christian country.

rejection.details: It's up to schools, not the Government or Parliament, to decide whether or not to have a nativity play at Christmas.
